data.message: How do I stop the "This is your Post" from popping up. It has to be the most annoying feature that has been debuted in years. MAKE IT STOP. Also, thanks a lot for the "This is your past" crap. I so love walking around crying for hours.

replies.message: Hey, Cliantha. We’re sorry to hear that. If there's anything you'd like for us to change, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2mGhuko. You can control which memories you see with the On This Day feature. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2mYrLtX. -Rhea
